mapper.insert: INSERT INTO place ( name, rating_avg, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, road_address_name, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{ratingAvg}, #{xCoordinate}, #{yCoordinate}, #{roadAddressName}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT place_id, name, rating_avg, x_coordinate, y_coordinate, road_address_name, created_at, updated_at FROM place WHERE place_id = #{placeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE place SET name = #{name}, rating_avg = #{ratingAvg}, x_coordinate = #{xCoordinate}, y_coordinate = #{yCoordinate}, road_address_name = #{roadAddressName}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE place_id = #{placeId}
